EmailTemplate.name: Proposal Follow Up Week 9
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name} Proposal Close Out
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.proposal_issued_to_1__c},
I haven’t heard back from you in the last two months regarding the proposal for {!Opportunity.Name}, so I’m going to assume you’ve gone in a different direction or the project is not moving forward. Mind if I close the file?
I appreciate the opportunity; please let me know if I can be of any assistance in the future.
Thank you! {!Opportunity.Sales_Head__c}, Principal
135 W 41st Street, 5th Floor New York, NY 10018 212.575.5300 w. NYE FaceBook
